mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PARTICIPANT (ID, MEMBER_ID, PLAN_ID) VALUES (SEQ_PARTICIPANT.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, ${planId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_PARTICIPANT P JOIN TBL_PLAN PL ON P.PLAN_ID = PL.ID JOIN TBL_COURSE C ON PL.COURSE_ID = C.ID WHERE P.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND C.COURSE_IS_VOLUNTEER = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_PARTICIPANT P JOIN TBL_PLAN PL ON P.PLAN_ID = PL.ID JOIN TBL_COURSE C ON PL.COURSE_ID = C.ID WHERE P.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND C.COURSE_IS_VOLUNTEER = 'Y'

SELECT COURSE_TYPE, COURSE_NAME, COURSE_FILE_PATH FROM ( SELECT C.COURSE_TYPE, C.COURSE_NAME, C.COURSE_FILE_PATH FROM TBL_PARTICIPANT P JOIN TBL_PLAN PL ON P.PLAN_ID = PL.ID JOIN TBL_COURSE C ON PL.COURSE_ID = C.ID WHERE P.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY PL.PLAN_END_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM TBL_PARTICIPANT WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId}
